name: OpenWorld
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: OpenWorld is a decentralized derivative exchange that support trading cryptoassets and other synthetic financial assets in non-custodial way. OpenWorld facilitates trading by building an open-source and transparent financial protocol that matches traders with trading capabilities such as long, short, margin trading to liquidity investors who provide liquidity to take counter-positions against the active traders for yield and trading fee earning opportunity. Pricing in the platform is provided by Chainlink Oracles from leading centralized and decentralized exchange.
